ftbquests.chapter.welcome.title: Welcome[--欢迎--]
ftbquests.chapter.welcome.subtitle: Beyond the skies![--超天!--]
ftbquests.chapter.welcome.quests0.title: Welcome to FTB Skies![--欢迎来到FTB Skies!--]
ftbquests.chapter.welcome.quests0.descri: Welcome back to &dFTB Skies&r, our skyblock pack for 1.19.2 that has now been taken to all new heights.[--欢迎来到&dFTB Skies&r,我们的空岛包为 1.19.2,现在已经到达所有新的高度.--]

&6These quests are optional&r but will help navigate the recipes and mechanical changes without them can be incredibly difficult. We suggest you use this as a guide to take you through your adventures in our skyblock world.[--&6这些任务是可选的&r,但会帮助导航配方和机械改变而没有它们可能非常困难。我们建议你用它作为指南来引导你通过你在空岛世界中的冒险。--]
The far left of the quest book has the &6chapter list&r.[--任务书的远处有&6章节列表&r.--]

Most resource aquisition can be found through JEI but the questbook will assist you in reaching the other dimensions and, launching your rocket to the stars above![--大部分资源需要可以通过JEI找到,但任务书将帮助你到达其他维度,并将你的火箭发射到上面的星星上!--]
&bWe hope you enjoy the journey ahead... You are in for a challenge and we're here for that!&r[--&b希望你喜欢前面的旅程...你正在接受挑战,我们在这里支持这个!&r--]
